> if the network in inundated with nodes that only serve pre-merge history (and in the future maybe on ~3 months history) then it will be more difficult to find peers who actually serve what you want 

yeah, this point resonates with me. having a bitmask of what nodes offer is kinda helpful, but I can't really navigate that with any intent for what blocks i want. i'd just be scanning through peers till i luck onto a bitmask that has the history i want/need
